name: Pepperoni Panic
description:
This is our entry for the Brackeys Game Jam 7 (2022.1).

We hope you enjoy our quick prototype. We had a lot more ideas but ran out of time, unfortunately.

Story

You work as a pizza delivery person - barely making a living while you hope for something else to come along. Night shifts, not enough sleep, struggling to pay your bills... You are exhausted and you decided to take a nap in your car - but you have to deliver multiple pizzas! Things are getting strange. Did you fall asleep and are you dreaming now? Is it real?
